mapper.select: select * from project where year = #{year} and batch_idx = #{batch_idx} and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.update: update project set name = #{project.name}, host = #{project.host}, phone = #{project.phone}, category_first_level = #{project.category_first_level}, category_second_level = #{project.category_second_level}, category_third_level = #{project.category_third_level}, department = #{project.department}, money = #{project.money}, start_time = #{project.start_time}, end_time = #{project.end_time}, number = #{project.number}, attachment_path = #{project.attachment_path}, year = #{project.year}, batch = #{project.batch} where id = #{project.id}
